name: Just relaxe and take a break
name_original: Just relaxe and take a break
description:
Thank you for playing...

I'm not happy with the result... 

I'm going to make a real game out of the original idea.

CONTROLS:

W - UP

A - LEFT

S - DOWN

D - RIGHT

E - INTERACT/COLLECT

ENTER - TO FINISH THE GAME

STORY:

It's night.

You are alone in a dark forest.

It's raining and you're freezing.

Your goal is to collect wood to use to build a campfire to warm you up.
